pkgmetadata.longdescription: MAP-Bayesian Estimation of PK Parameters // Performs maximum a posteriori Bayesian estimation of individual pharmacokinetic parameters from a model defined in 'mrgsolve', typically for model-based therapeutic drug monitoring. Internally computes an objective function value from model and data, performs optimization and returns predictions in a convenient format. The performance of the package was described by Le Louedec et al (2021) doi:10.1002/psp4.12689.
